FuncDef:
The multicast routing-enable command enables the multicast function.
The undo multicast routing-enable command restores the default configuration. The multicast routing-enable command enables the multicast function. The undo multicast routing-enable command restores the default configuration. By default, the multicast function is disabled. When the multicast function is not enabled, the Router cannot forward multicast packets.
ExtraInfo: The multicast function should be enabled before you configure all the multicast commands.
